Text:
no virus this is virus free

I got this one,

Just saying as i know a lot of things throw false positives.

I'm willing to trust a "Trusted" account. But what is the point in claiming it's virus scanned? You offer no proof, and... Norton, seriously? You don't seem even remotely computer educated.

Anyway, spammers will be spamming sub-human scum. No need to reply.
